title: 100 years of Olympic glory
brief_description: Moving tales of courage and persistence, disappointment and victory bring vividly to life the remarkable athletes and amazing feats which have made the modern Olympics a monumental international event. Discover which seven year old boy became the youngest ever Gold Medal winner, what medal a Japanese gymnast won after breaking his knee in the middle of an event and who is called “the fastest human alive.”
